name: Septimus

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ATK in all Battles by 23%.

skills.name: Behead
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Grants an Extra Turn and resets the cooldown on this Champion's Holy Sword Skill if the target is killed.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Holy Sword
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore [Shield] and [Block Damage] buffs. Damage increases according to enemy MAX HP.
Damage based on: [ATK] [Enemy MAX HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Giant Killer
skills.raw_description: Each attack has a 30% chance of increasing the duration of all debuffs on the target by 1 turn. Damage inflicted by each attack increases by 30% if the enemy's current HP is over 50%.
